data.Title: Google Makes Changes to Search Console, Ads, and Maps
data.Description: Google has made several updates to its products, including cleaning up the data anomalies page in Search Console, forcing some advertisers to switch from credit card payments to ACH/Check/Wire payments in Google Ads, and updating its Maps contributor "fake engagement" policy.

data.Title: Apple Updates Applebot Documentation
data.Description: Apple has updated its Applebot documentation with several changes, including the addition of Applebot-Extended, Reverse DNS, and more user agents. The update follows the Apple Intelligence preview at WWDX.

data.Title: Google Updates Hreflang Documentation
data.Description: Google has updated its hreflang documentation to clarify that link tags for denoting alternate versions of a page must not be combined in a single link tag.

data.Title: Google Allows Ads Discussing Opioid Painkillers
data.Description: Google Ads now permits advertisements that discuss opioid painkillers without promoting or selling them.

data.Title: Tracking Google AI Overviews in Search Console Proves Difficult
data.Description: Users are finding it challenging to track Google AI Overviews in Google Search Console, with attempts to analyze the impact on CTR and traffic proving confusing and messy.

data.Title: TikTok Introduces AI Avatars for Ads
data.Description: TikTok ads will now feature AI avatars of creators and stock actors. The platform is introducing "Stock Avatars" created using paid actors licensed for commercial use.

data.Title: YouTube Tests Notes Feature for Videos
data.Description: YouTube is piloting a new "Notes" feature for videos, allowing viewers to add notes to specific parts of a video. The feature will initially be available on mobile in the US and in English.

data.Title: Runway Unveils Gen-3 Alpha for Realistic Video Generation
data.Description: Runway has launched Gen-3 Alpha, an AI model capable of generating high-quality, realistic video clips of up to 10 seconds in length. The model builds on the company's previous Gen-2 release and increases competition with OpenAI's Sora.

data.Title: Google Chrome to Introduce AI-Powered "Listen to This Page" Feature
data.Description: Google is rolling out a "Listen to this page" feature for Chrome on Android, enabling the browser to read text-heavy web pages aloud. The feature includes a mini-player with playback controls and a progress indicator.

data.Title: GiG Acquires SEO Specialist Titan
data.Description: Gaming Innovation Group (GiG) has acquired Titan, a provider of SEO and content services, for €3.2 million.

data.Title: Google's Advice on Fixing Broken Backlinks
data.Description: Google's Gary Illyes has offered advice on addressing broken backlinks, suggesting that webmasters shouldn't worry about them too much.
